text: Chocolate milk, also known as cocoa milk or syruped chocolate milkshake, is a kind of cold, sweetened milk drink. Chocolate milk may be made by mixing cold milk with chocolate syrup or cocoa powder and sugar. ==Similar beverages== A mixture of hot milk and melted chocolate (or cocoa powder and sugar) is called hot chocolate. A mixture of ice cream, cold milk, and chocolate syrup is called a milkshake. ==Related pages== *Milk *Chocolate == Other websites == * How To Make Chocolate Milk Category:Milk drinks
title: Chocolate milk
